    • Method Detail

      • getMDDManager

        public MDDManager getMDDManager()
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel
        Get the MDD factory holding logical functions for this model.
        Specified by:
        getMDDManager in interface LogicalModel
        Returns:
        the MDD factory in which logical function are stored.

      • getNodeOrder

        public List getNodeOrder()
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel
        Get the list of core nodes in this model. Logical functions for these nodes (in the same order) can be obtained with the getLogicalFunctions() method.
        Specified by:
        getNodeOrder in interface LogicalModel
        Returns:
        the list of nodeInfo objects for core components.

      • getLogicalFunctions

        public int[] getLogicalFunctions()
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel
        Get the logical function of core components in this model. The order used is the same as for getNodeOrder(). These functions are just identifiers, actual functions are stored in the MDD factory provided by getMDDManager.
        Specified by:
        getLogicalFunctions in interface LogicalModel
        Returns:
        the list of logical function identifiers for core components

      • getExtraComponents

        public List<NodeInfo> getExtraComponents()
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel
        Get the list of extra components in this model. Extra components have logical functions, but do not regulate any component, they are thus NOT considered as variables in the MDDManager. Logical functions for these nodes (in the same order) can be obtained with the getExtraLogicalFunctions() method.
        Specified by:
        getExtraComponents in interface LogicalModel
        Returns:
        the list of nodeInfo objects for extra components.

      • getExtraLogicalFunctions

        public int[] getExtraLogicalFunctions()
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel
        Get the logical function of extra components in this model. The order used is the same as for getExtraNodes(). These functions are just identifiers, actual functions are stored in the MDD factory provided by getMDDManager().
        Specified by:
        getExtraLogicalFunctions in interface LogicalModel
        Returns:
        the list of logical function identifiers for extra components

      • clone

        public LogicalModel clone()
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel
        Make a copy of this model. This will duplicate logical functions pointers, but not the actual MDD Factory.
        Specified by:
        clone in interface LogicalModel
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object
        Returns:
        a copy of this model.

      • getTargetValue

        public byte getTargetValue(int nodeIdx,
                  byte[] state)
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel
        Compute the target value of a core component for a given state.
        Specified by:
        getTargetValue in interface LogicalModel
        Parameters:
        nodeIdx - index of the component in the core node order
        state - value of components
        Returns:
        the target value reached for this state

                 byte[] state)
        Description copied from interface: LogicalModel

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
